Title: StarWars The empire strikes back
Description:
"Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back" follows the Rebel Alliance as they are 
relentlessly pursued by the sinister Galactic Empire. Luke Skywalker undergoes rigorous training 
with Jedi Master Yoda, while Han Solo and Princess Leia evade Imperial forces

Title: Interstellar
Description:
"Interstellar" depicts a near-future Earth on the brink of environmental collapse. 
A team of astronauts, led by a former NASA pilot, embarks on a daring mission through a wormhole 
near Saturn to find a new habitable planet for humanity's survival, facing the vast unknowns of space and time.

Title: Back to the Future
Description:
"Back to the Future" follows the adventures of Marty McFly, a teenager who is 
accidentally sent back in time to 1955 in a DeLorean time machine invented by his eccentric friend, 
Dr. Emmett Brown. Marty must ensure his parents' budding romance while finding 
a way to return to 1985, facing comedic mishaps and unforeseen consequences along the way.

Title: Toy Story
Description:
"Toy Story" follows the secret life of toys led by Woody, a pull-string 
cowboy doll, and Buzz Lightyear, a space ranger action figure. When Woody gets jealous of Buzz, they find 
themselves lost and must work together to find their way back home to their owner, 
Andy, before he moves to a new house.

Title: Joker
Description:
"Joker" delves into the origin story of the iconic Batman villain, Arthur Fleck, 
a failed stand-up comedian who descends into madness and becomes the criminal mastermind 
known as the Joker. Set in Gotham City during the early 1980s, the film explores themes of mental illness, 
societal decay, and the consequences of violence.

Title: Inception
Description:
"Inception" follows Dom Cobb, a skilled thief who specializes in the dangerous 
art of extraction, stealing secrets from deep within the subconscious during dream states. 
Cobb is offered a chance at redemption in exchange for one last job - the inception of an 
idea into the mind of a powerful businessman. As Cobb and his team navigate through layers 
of dreams within dreams, they face challenges and confront their own inner demons.
